pr_title: GEODE-8338: Redis commands may be repeated when server dies

timeline.message: GEODE-8338: Redis commands may be repeated when server dies
fixed HashAndCrashes test by adding exception handling

CommandFunction invoke will now retry if BucketMoved is thrown.
Added a sleep before returning an error that a server crashed
Adds retry logic to session dunit tests
now handles FunctionException with nested BucketMovedException
fixed index out of bounds exception

more exception handling work
also fixed a race in registering the function after the region is created
also added retry logic to some tests

improved handling of FunctionInvocationTargetException
we no longer retry on this acception since the application
needs to decide if the op needs to be done again

test now do a better job of handling retry if a server departs
removed a sleep that was added before failing due to a server departing

refactored how functions are invoked so that both
the CommandFunction and RenameFunction would have consistent retry logic

changed computeWithPrimaryLocked to throw new PrimaryBucketLockException
if it fails to lock the primary down for computation.
The function invoke retry logic now only retries if it sees
a PrimaryBucketLockException or if the function is not
registered yet.

timeline.bodyText: I'd prefer to see this retry logic happen in the Controller, but we can make that change later.
timeline.author: jdeppe-pivotal

replies.bodyText: Is the Controller part of the product or part of this test app?
